C

ComplexQuadrilateral - Class in <Unnamed>
A self-intersecting quadrilateral is called variously a cross-quadrilateral, crossed quadrilateral, butterfly quadrilateral or bow-tie quadrilateral.
ComplexQuadrilateral(double, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class ComplexQuadrilateral
 
computeAdjacentAngle(double) - Static method in class Parallelogram
 
computeAngle(StraightLine, StraightLine) - Static method in class Polygon
This static method will compute the angle between two intersecting lines using the equation: tangent(theta) = |(m1-m2)/(1+m1m2)|.
computeArea(double, double, double, double, double) - Static method in class Quadrilateral
This method will use Bretschneider's formula to compute the area of a quadrilateral.
computeArea(Polygon, double) - Static method in class RightPrism
 
computeArea(double, double, double) - Static method in class Triangle
 
computeDistance(Vertex, Vertex) - Static method in class StraightLine
This method will use the distance formula to calculate the straight-path distance between two vertices.
computePerimeter(double, double, double, double, double) - Static method in class Quadrilateral
This method will compute the perimeter by computing the length of the top side and then adding together the length of each side.
computePerimeter(double, double, double) - Static method in class Triangle
 
computeQuadrilateralCoordinates(double, double, double, double, double) - Static method in class Quadrilateral
This method will compute the coordinates of a quadrilateral.
computeSlope(Vertex, Vertex) - Static method in class StraightLine
This method computes the slope of the line using the two coordinate pairs that belong to the object.
computeSurfaceArea(Polygon, double) - Static method in class RightPrism
 
computeTriangleCoordinates(double, double, double) - Static method in class Triangle
This method will compute the third vertex of the triangle when we assume that we know the two vertices of the base edge, which are (0,0) and (length of base, 0).
computeVertexC(double, double) - Static method in class Quadrilateral
This method will compute the x and y coordinates of the C vertex using the SOHCAHTOA method and its respective trigonometric properties.
computeVertexD(double, double, double) - Static method in class Quadrilateral
This method will compute the x and y coordinates of the D vertex using the SOHCAHTOA method.
